dunk.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to quickly put something into a liquid and take it out again, especially something you are eating
dunk.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Jill dunked her ginger biscuit in her tea.
I dunked my head under the water and scrubbed at my hair.
dunk.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to push someone under water for a short time as a joke
dunk.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to jump up by the basket and throw the ball down into it in basketball
